entries.text: StickerYou.com allows you to create completely customizable stickers and much more. If you’re looking for the perfect way to have your brand seen wherever you go, StickerYou’s custom stickers are great to use as laptop stickers, leaving no residue. You can order any size, shape and order quantity. Use code PERL10 at checkout for 10% off.
entries.title: Brand your laptop with great custom stickers and build awareness wherever you go

entries.text: A set operation disguised as a list operation. OT asked for a solution. Interesting that some people immediately start talking about efficiency. Is it immature optimization or is it the right thing to consider?

chapters.header: A section for newbies and for people who need some refreshing of their Perl knowledge. The included articles are from the Perl Maven Tutorial and are part of the Perl Maven eBook.

header: This seemed to be a calm week, though Jonathan lit up my Perl 6 feed.

BTW I am looking for examples on how Jenkins is being used. If you have any examples you can share. e.g. you can send me your Jenkinsfile for private reading or you know about an open source project with an interesting Jenkinsfile, please let me know!
subject: Perl One-Liners for $1
